page.title: 14EILEAN DONAN CASTLE,DORNIE
page.content: The castle is often used by film companies.This is mainly for advertisements but recently it has been the setting of a major motion picture.This was difficult for the staff of the castle as the film company were very particular.They required all sorts of changes to be made including false windows and chimney pots.There was some concern about the use of the main bridge as it is not built to take heavyweights.It was not expected that horses would be ridden over it as it is mainly for decoration.The film company had to make many other changes including getting rid of the tarmacadam road, electricity and telephone lines,TV aerials and fences.The castle is popular with the film companies as it has a good background colour and it photographs well.
